page.title: 06Cafe at Hell's Mouth.
page.content: The seasonal cafe in this area opens from Easter to September. The opening hours are from 10 am to 6 pm. Sales are affected by weather conditions, ie sales decrease when it is raining. The most popular items sold there are ice-cream, teas and coffee, with the tea and ice-creams being the most expensive respectively. The morning is the busiest time of day, although th occupiers do find that they are occasionally involved in coastal rescues, such as cliff safety and contact of coastal services.
